name: Team Spark Container
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y dos2unix && dos2unix /workspaces/spark-container/scripts/setup.sh && git config --global http.postBuffer 524288000 && bash /workspaces/spark-container/scripts/snetsdk.sh && pip3 install snet-cli==2.1.2 && rm -f .gitignore && rm -rf .devcontainer
